title: Bug 18163: Add Import should ignore leading/trailing whitespace
description: When using 'Add Import,' it should ignore any leading or trailing whitespace in the selection.
OB: Currently, when I use 'Add Import' and select 'Node ' with leading whitespace, the system adds 'Node ' to the import statement.
EB: I expect that when I use 'Add Import' and select 'Node ' with leading whitespace, it should add 'Node' to the import statement, ignoring the leading/trailing whitespace.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Open a source file in the code editor.
2. Locate a part of the code that requires importing a module, for example, 'Node '.
3. Use the 'Add Import' feature by using 'Shift + Ctrl + Right' to select 'Node '.
4. Observe that the import statement includes the leading/trailing whitespace.
